Information_1_1: ^You there! You’re the one who washed up on the beach. You should leave if you know what’s good for you! There are dark forces at work in this town… Someone has upset the spirits!
^Hello there. You must be the Elder I have heard about.
^Get away from me old man! I don’t believe in all that spiritual stuff!

c-0: ^I am Sten, yes. The elder. Mark my words… dark forces are at play in this town. They’ll see… they’ll all see!
c-1: ^Heed my warnings! Dark forces! You’ll see soon enough!
